document.heading: District of Columbia Boxing and Wrestling Commission Nominee Confirmation Procedure Act of 1976

history.narrative: Law 1-66, the “District of Columbia Boxing and Wrestling Commission Nominee Confirmation Procedure Act of 1976,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-219, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 27, 1976, and February 24, 1976, respectively. No action taken by the Mayor, it was assigned Act No. 1-98 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
